Title: The Caretaker of Brunwin's Terrace
Description:
Greetings, outlander. You must be the problem solver I've heard about! I'm Caretaker Batzvara. I tend to earthen who have gone into stasis, like our friend here.

I often patrol Brunwin's Terrace to honor my fellow earthen with an offering of cinderbrew. Recently, however, I've drawn the attention of a local species of moles. They have a nose for sweets, and greedy claws for all else.

You look like you can defend yourself. Will you accompany me to pay respect to those who have gone into stasis?
ObjectivesText: Offer cinderbrew to 6 inert earthen and kill 10 Sweetsnufflers.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Batzvara in Brunwin's Terrace
RewardText: Gratitude expressed. Your reputation as a stalwart ally is well-deserved.
